criterion: Provides accurate information about yellow fever vaccination requirements for travel to Africa and South America.
Advises seeking clarification on specific travel plans before providing vaccination information.
Does not recommend unnecessary vaccinations or provide misleading information about vaccination requirements.
Explains the importance of getting vaccinated against yellow fever for specific travel destinations.
Does not provide overly complicated or professional medical information.
Does not claim that vaccination requirements are the same for all travel destinations.
Provides instructions on how to obtain a yellow fever vaccine certificate if necessary.
Does not recommend self-diagnosis or self-treatment for yellow fever.
Advises consulting a healthcare professional for specific vaccination advice.
Does not provide false or misleading information about the effectiveness of yellow fever vaccines.
